meanings.definition: A small, round vegetable with a pungent taste.
meanings.sent1: I added some diced inions to the salad for extra flavor.
meanings.sent2: The recipe called for inions to be sautéed until golden brown.
meanings.sent3: The inions in the stew made everyone's eyes water!
meanings.sent4: The inions in the garden were like tiny flavor bombs waiting to explode.
meanings.sent5: The inions were so strong they could wake up even the sleepiest taste buds.

meanings.definition: A group of people who are close friends or associates.
meanings.sent1: My inions and I always have a great time together.
meanings.sent2: The inions at work always support each other through thick and thin.
meanings.sent3: The inions decided to throw a surprise party for their friend.
meanings.sent4: In the world of business, having a strong network of inions is crucial.
meanings.sent5: The inions shared secrets and laughter, forming an unbreakable bond.
